root.name: Sankyo Fever! Fever!
root.description: OverviewFirst title of the Sankyo Fever series of video games. SANKYO, Co., Ltd. (株式会社三共 Kabushiki Kaisha Sankyō) is a Japanese manufacturer of pachinko machines.Three Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation titles were released for the Super Famicom. Other Sankyo Fever titles were released for the PlayStation, Sega Saturn, and WonderSwan.
